channel.title: Changing D Claw attack Emote + 60 Defence Problem
channel.description:
OK I figured how to add d claws and that, and they equipt perfectly, what i need to know now is how to change the emote or gfx when you attack with them, also how to fix the 60 defence thing ( when u try to equipt it says you need 60 deffence to wield instead of 60 attack )
Thanks

item.title: Changing D Claw attack Emote + 60 Defence Problem
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

depends on what code u use for ur d claws, these are my own d claws

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6587 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtk(true, 25, 252, 2068);
DCdown = 4;
DCDamg = true;
getHit(8);
usingSpecial = true;
}
